recipesJson.name: My Strawberry Cream v2
recipesJson.author: KylezKloudz
recipesJson.description:
A second version of my strawberry and cream vape recipe... Just picked up TPA Sweet Strawberry along with FW Yogurt on my last flavor haul over Thanksgiving and wanted to give it a go so I just made some substitutions from my first version and here you go! Pretty simple and straight forward utilizing core flavorings most mixers should have so hopefully you won't be left out of you wanna give it a try...

It's pretty much S&V but like anything settles in over the next couple days... 

Wishing Everyone A Merry Xmas & Happy New Year! ðŸ‘Š Let's keep mixing! ðŸ’ª
